title: Boys and Girls Together
description: Wild, tough, tender, courageous, and brutally honest. With stunning realism, the tangled passions, yearnings, frustrations, and dreams of a generation of young people spring to life. In the army, in the money-lined corridors of power, on the neon-lit streets of New York City, here are their twisted passions and lives... and an achievement by one of the most perceptive writers of our time.
author: William Goldman
